text:
Hi fellow HubSpot developers! Our agency is currently over swamped with web development work, so we have a need to grow our development team for a limited period. In particular, we have a handful of complicated blogs to build for various clients coming up, and would anyone be interested in taking a look at a project spec and providing an estimate to complete a one-time project?

I am the lead developer for the agency I work for, so I could help explain to you exactly what it is that we need...

If you're interested, send me a DM
